website_summaries.verdict: The ideal pick for owners wanting their dog dryer to include a number of fun, useful accessories.
pros: Accessories include a handy steel comb, two filters, and four different nozzles
Air speed and temperature are adjustable
Customers are amazed by how quickly it dried their larger dogs with heavier coats
cons: Not the best choice for professional use
Still gets a little warm even when switched to a cooler setting

customer_reviews.title: Salon Quality and Budget Price
customer_reviews.text: Having been a professional dog groomer, I knew I wanted my own dryer for my pet and any clients I may do, but did not want to spend tons of money on a professional salon dryer. I'm so glad I purchased this dryer. It's very small and light, but don't let that fool you, this thing packs a punch, it's much more powerful than the "self-wash" doggy stations and yet it is quiet and has a high and low setting. I love the heat element as well, as it does not get too hot, but provides a little boost to dry my dog quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Must have for home grooming
customer_reviews.text: I have malti poos and for years I've spent a lot of time with a regular hair dryer and as you can imagine, that takes quite a while. I wish I would have thought about buying one of these sooner. I am drying my dogs in a fraction of the time, it's absolutely amazing. Although it comes with several attachments, I only use the one that has the nozzles. It seems to work the best for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Great product and OUTSTANDING customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item 18 months ago and it has been a work horse. Built solid and dries my dog easily 3x faster than a regular drier. I had an issue after 18 months with the switch and it is likely caused by me with how I stored it (I think I had something pressed up against it). Nevertheless, the seller was very responsive many months later. Not only do I recommend this product on Amazon, but many of my friends have also bought this after I recommended it to them, and they are pleased with it. Many thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian J Hull

customer_reviews.title: Acts like an expensive dryer at an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect superb quality because the price is so good. I was willing to accept an ok dryer. But this dryer is fantastic! we run a pet hotel that does several baths a day and this dryer has performed exceptionally! When the motor finally did go out I contacted the seller here and they were responsive and amazing and are completely fixing our issue. Could not ask for a better experience. I actually purchased the 4 HP one as well since I love this thing so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amber J

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write a lot of product reviews but wanted to write one for this dryer. It works fantastic but about 2 years after purchase one of the toggle /levers quit working. I thought great money down the drain but took a chance and wrote the company. They worked with me every way possible and sent parts and a video on how to fix it. I was so happy and impressed with their above and beyond attitude. Grace was wonderful and easy to work with. My dryer is as good as new! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Joann Dattilo

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer for price and size
customer_reviews.text: Great dryer for price and size. It was delivered yesterday, so I put it to the test on my English Setter. It's not as powerful as the dryers I used in a salon but it does the work. It's quieter then the professional dryer. The motor sounds like it's going to hold out. The heat/power switch is easy to operate and easily accessible on top of the machine. The hose expands when the machine is on giving a great reach and recoils when the machine is turned off saving space. This little beauty is going to be used weekly to dry both my dogs. Will update after a few more uses if its functionality becomes an issue.
customer_reviews.author: joanna

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Corgi. We have always used a human hair dryer after showers, but it just takes too long to dry him, so I decided to spend a bit more on this dog fur dryer and I am so glad I did. It is really strong, with different settings on air speed and wind capacity. I leave it on the lowest setting and it dries my dog in no time. The air is heated as well, which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Great Dryer and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing dryer, very powerful blower, lots of attachments, long very flexible hose, and heavy metal casing. Dries the standard poodle with ease. Perhaps most impressive is the outstanding online customer service. There was a malfunction with the dryer (these things happen, right). In contacting customer service they shipped a new dryer promptly and stayed in touch via email on an almost daily basis to make sure that I was satisfied. Again I can't say enough about the superior customer service of this firm.
customer_reviews.author: robedon60

customer_reviews.title: This works wonderfully on our double coat Samoyed
customer_reviews.text: This works wonderfully on our double coat Samoyed. It does get a little hot when operating, so be careful not to get too close to your dog's skin when using. The attachments are also great for getting all of her parts dry, highly recommended! UPDATE: After almost 1.5 years of using this, one of the prongs broke off of the plug. I emailed Lan, the customer service agent, and he kindly sent us a replacement blower because ours no longer worked. Even though this part is not covered under warranty, he kindly offered to replace it, free of charge. I highly recommend this product, it works great and the customer service is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: CSulbaran

customer_reviews.title: Warranty honored  extremely fadt
customer_reviews.text: So I've had the dryer for couple of years now. With normal use the hose broke, I got on amazon to order a replacement, when I pulled up the exact dryer I purchased, it said all part warrantied for life...I didn't have to search my paperwork just click the return button and tell them my problem, to my surprise a new hose arrived at my door the only question asked was current address, and no money exchange Now that is a company worth reviewing and raving about . Going to look up Free Paws products all my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Martin

customer_reviews.title: I’m a groomer who uses this for hours daily!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this blow dryer! It’s great for blowing dogs out as well as drying fast! I’ve had it for two years and honestly didn’t expect it to last more than a year for the price. It has beyond exceeded my expectations! My hose finally bit the dust (just a month shy of two years old & strenuous use). I am beyond happy with this product and recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dryer!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 6lb Havanese I bought this for, I can now dry her in 5 minutes on low! It might seem like overkill for one tiny dog, but she gets wet a lot then gets matted and then I have to shave her. So this dries her or her feet very fast and keeps her from going to the groomer, saving me $50 month!
customer_reviews.author: David Tre

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Customer Services
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in Feb/2017 and we just loved it. The power it has, the options for speed and temperature, and also all of the different nozzles, but the another important point to be considered is the amazing customer services provided by Brandline. Few weeks ago this dryer started releasing black dust (unusual issue) and I decided to contact Brandline: the initial response was made in the same day (Sunday night) and in 5 days I got a new one in my home. The process was not faster, because I delayed to reply one of the emails for two days. So, 100% approved the product and the Brandline services.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and customer service/support
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this dryer awesome but I had a few questions and emailed customer service and there response was super fast and very helpful and this was even over Christmas break. The reply was so fast I really thought it was a fake reply. I set up my dog grooming station with the dryer and vacuum and this blower/dryer is way quieter then the vacuum and work way better then what they say. I’m super happy and so is my little Pomeranian. I very much recommend this to everyone for any pet.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: ... detached from the fitting on the barrel making it useless as half the air escapes from the hole
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this product 9 weeks and the cord detached from the fitting on the barrel making it useless as half the air escapes from the hole. Since it past the return date there is no way to get in touch with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: I’d give this Blower 10 Points if I could!
customer_reviews.text: We have two Golden Retriever puppies with thick puppy coats. They are our 3rd and 4th Golden’s. I’ve always used my personal blow dryer and decided to get this dryer. WOW! It makes a tough job super easy! We love it! So powerful! Dries a 15 pound puppy in less than five minutes. I like that can use room temp air or low or high heat and low or high velocity.
customer_reviews.author: JannaBananaBama

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer but noisy
customer_reviews.text: This dryer works great. We use the attachment that looks like a comb. It blows air out each prong, and works well to get up under the pomeranian's thick fur undercoat. It cut our drying time at least in half. It is a quite noisy so we started with one of the dogs that we felt would tolerate it best, and progressed down the line to dry all 4 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Peachrose

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to say the dryer was perfect but after about ten uses I had a problem with the on switch. I emailed and was immediately taken care of by way of sending me a new upgraded dryer at no cost. The original product was terrific and cut the dry time on my Labradoodle down to about 1/4 the time with a human dryer, such an improvement! I recommend buying anything from this company as my experience could not have been more smooth and despite the bad luck, the resolution was so fast and pleasant I just don't think you can go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: elise

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: I used this twice now on my two dogs and I think it works great. They are probably 95% dry fairly quickly. I don't use the hot setting though. I have an 85lb furry, double coated shepherd mix and a 45lb mixed breed with long, thin wavy hair.
customer_reviews.author: Zo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best investments, this thing not only saves my time but also my back! The dogs took sometime to get used to but they are totally okay with it now! We live in south florida and they are constantly taking dips in the pool and beach! Have been using it for a couple of months close to even a year and still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Luilitt

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Goodness this thing is powerful. I dry my long haired husky in about 10 minutes! Very pleased. Edit: a switch on the unit broke, Brandline offered to send me a replacement free of charge even though I am out of warranty. Very impressed, will purchase my next unit from them.
customer_reviews.author: ZP

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this product and would highly recommend to my dog friends!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this dryer once so far. That being said I love the power it has and owning a Sheltie it takes only minutes to dry compared with the hand dryer that I was using before!
customer_reviews.author: Connie T. Plante

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, great hair dryer. Had it almost two years and had a problem. Issue easily resolved by customer service, back up and running. Great customer service. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: plb

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This product has two temp setting and a high and low air setting. I took off one start because it has a high pitch whistle when you try to get close. Not sure if it is the nozzle or the hose. We have had this for two years and it still works great. I would certainly buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok dryer, it does not seem to heat correctly, even on high heat the hose is warm but the air is still cold. It might actually be too much air flow to keep up with the heat. Overall a very good home users dryer, our Rough collie double coat and our Afghan hound silky coat is not a 15 min or even 30 min dry time. but it is a little faster then 2 heavy duty hand held dryers.
customer_reviews.author: Elad

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and useful
customer_reviews.text: We live in Boulder Colorado so the kids are constantly getting ice in their paws and on their legs. We keep this in the garage to give them a blow down after playing in snow. Minor criticism is that the heat is not quite hot enough. I understand that we have to be cautious with dogs however. Overall great product
customer_reviews.author: D. stark

customer_reviews.title: Very good pet dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this dryer for our long haired puppy to use instead of our personal hair dryer. We wanted a dryer that worked more quickly and had the correct temperature for our puppy. This dryer works really well and our pup doesn't mind it. This is a much better option that a "people" hair dryer. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: H. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: A little loud but worth every penny - will review again in a few months
customer_reviews.text: We have three dogs, and the grooming process is intense for our Havanese. This blow dryer, plus Chi for dogs, has cut our grooming time in half. It is a little loud but the outcome is worth the extra noise. Our boys don't mind the noise as long as you keep it away from their ears - common sense but it needs to be said.
customer_reviews.author: WE

customer_reviews.title: This blower works great, still working on getting my dogs use to ...
customer_reviews.text: This blower works great, still working on getting my dogs use to being blow dried. My husband has even used it for himself. Love the attachment with the 'fingers' really gets under the hair of my long haired dogs. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: dogranch

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Received the dryer yesterday. After drying the first dog the dryer will not turn off. The dryer does a good job drying the dogs but you are only as good as your weakest part. I will be returning this dryer I just noticed the heat switch and neither indicator light is working.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Other wise works great. I have small dogs with very long hair
customer_reviews.text: The plastic ring/nut around the heat switch cracked/broke, disappointing. Other wise works great. I have small dogs with very long hair, it really fluffs their hair, dries them quickly. Much safer then my hair drier, as it does not get as hot. They do not like the high speed. This unit has two speeds I wish it had three. I wash my dogs once a week, then once a month to the groomer.
customer_reviews.author: Mistress Spider

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought this Years ago! No more drying in the sun, no more going to self doggy washes, no hassle just dry my girl right here at home. We found that if my girl stays in the bath tub, it is best for drying. Yes it is louder but outside was a disaster. She was wet and got dirty all over again. But inside she was just fine in the tub being blow dried! Lots of treats and she is good! Fast shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: chitownegrl

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Has more power on high than my leaf blower, not that I use it on my little 5lb. Maltese!
customer_reviews.author: Mikki E.

customer_reviews.title: Good option for the money, kind of loud.. read on
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my Persian kitten and older cat. Its kind of loud so I put the base of it on a stool behind the kitchen island to help with that. The attachments are great. A little learning curve so you don't burn the kitten but works pretty quickly. It has high and low/ heat and no heat. My only issue is the loudness. but good dryer for the money
customer_reviews.author: Cavimom

customer_reviews.title: Good Dryer
customer_reviews.text: I have no problem with the dryer but my Newfoundland does she bark and bark jumping around I change to low setting that do not change her mood, I had the dryer for 2 years now did any one ran into this problem ..How long will it take for her to quite her down I only use it for few times. how long shall I keep trying. ..sure need some feedback.. thank-you Jean R.
customer_reviews.author: jean ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on reviews. After the first time of using it it lost the bolts that hold the legs on. I have goldens and I think I might need more power for their coats. Overall not impressed after the first time of using it I was trying to find the bolts to keep the legs on. Also the attachments I wish they clipped on as if you don’t have them on tight enough they blow off
customer_reviews.author: Tarynn B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but can't find replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional dog groomer and I really love this dryer. It blows through large dogs and thick coats very well. The temperature gets pretty hot too. I only gave it 4 stars because I have had the dryer for just about 3 months now and I believe the brushes need to be replaced (when the heat setting is on an awful smell comes from the dryer). The problem is that I can not find replacement brushes. It still works and doesn't smell when the heat is turned off, but the process takes longer.
customer_reviews.author: roscoe4me

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a normal coat Akita who's coat is dry in about 20 minutes only using low speed and low heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Motor burns up fast
customer_reviews.text: Second one I have had to buy in the last year. The motor burnt on both and the rubber feet fall off. The machine was great at first but was very short lived and left me upset and in a bind
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: ALL dog owners should have this product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this dryer!!! It would take me an hour to dry our Aussie with a hair dryer and her still would be completely dry. He drys in 10-15 minutes max with this product. The VERY BEST thing Is if Buddy gets dirty outside we “blow” him off and often times he doesn’t require re-bathing!!! Yay! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Isley

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: have used this a couple of times and find it works pretty well. no problems so far. and my dog doesn't seem to be frightened of it.
customer_reviews.author: Willis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dryer
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer is fantastic amazing great I am so happy dry my dog hair just in 20 minutes My dog is a golden poodle medium size With lot of hair And also i dry my daughter hair in just 5 min. Its great and funny to dry hair with this dryer So happy i will buy it again and again No problem at all Fast delivery i recommend 100 %
customer_reviews.author: patricio

customer_reviews.title: Dries my Golden's hair quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and dries my golden's hair very quickly. I was concerned after reading one of two reviews that she'd be afraid of the noise but she became use to how loud and noisy is was right away and she loves getting dried off.
customer_reviews.author: Capecod3

customer_reviews.title: Only had it for awhile Works great when my dog plays out side in the melting ...
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for awhile Works great when my dog plays out side in the melting snow and rain . My dog loves having his hair dryer. He's a long hair border Collie mix. Haven't had time give him a bath to try it out ,but sure it will work great.
customer_reviews.author: JML

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Not too loud for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Not too loud for my dog. My first one stopped working after 7 months and customer service was quick to send me a replacement! Couldn't get any better than that! Great to have a company that stands behind its product. My second one is working just as well as the first one and it dries my dog in at least 1/2 the time. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L.

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic dryer! Prior to this
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic dryer! Prior to this, I had only used a people hair dryer on my two Standard Poodles. They took forever to dry them. This dryer is quick, quiet, and doesn't traumatize the dogs. I especially like the nozzle with the fingers on it. I use it even when the dogs aren't wet, to fluff up their hair, which makes them look freshly groomed. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hanson

customer_reviews.title: drys my standard poodle no time flat
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing it takes 5 minutes to dry my standard Poodle before it took my up to 1 hour to dry her. But 2 of the little black feet came of within a month and when it is on high it is very! loud. other than that it is good.
customer_reviews.author: quiltosaurus2

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Great for a month broke and took it in and they said that they could not fix it what a waste
customer_reviews.author: 1 Love

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for home grooming your pet. We have a poodle, and the drying time was significantly shortened with this device. Somewhat noisy, and it may take time for your dog to accommodate. But I have been very happy using this tool.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gorlin

customer_reviews.title: Grooming made easier!
customer_reviews.text: Although I usually have our labradoodle professionally groomed, this has certainly help make it easier for me to do it at home when I need to do it. I like the power of the airflow.
customer_reviews.author: Golf fan Di

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and easy to acclimate anxious dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer! I have a Pyrenees, a Pyrenees/Newfoundland cross, and a Bloodhound. It cut my grooming time down by HOURS! No joke. I use it instead of brushing too! It really gets there undercoat up and I can pull the loose hair out with my fingers! I can't tell you enough how much I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Billie Jacobs-Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: First time ordering a product like this, and I have to say it doesn’t disappoint!! I have three English Bulldogs and this dryer worked perfectly for each one! So happy I can get rid of using towels to dry my dogs off and use something that you would see a pet salon! Product is made very well too!
customer_reviews.author: sonya ward

customer_reviews.title: Great product and features for our puppy
customer_reviews.text: Great product with temperature control and fan speeds. Accessories are a big plus also. Dries our puppy quickly without worrying about getting too hot for his sensitive skin. It's a little loud but our puppy seems to adjust quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Willey

customer_reviews.title: light weight and love the heat
customer_reviews.text: only used it once so far, but seems to work great love the heat setting and so does my 2 coated Lab that never dries. The dryer DOES help a lot just depends on how long you want to use it. So for the first time use I give it a 5 star rating
customer_reviews.author: A Buongiorne

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful dryer for small pets. I have this in my shop for the 10lb and under dogs. My other groomers love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnya

customer_reviews.title: I love the different attachments
customer_reviews.text: We have a Chow Chow and this dryer worked very well with him. It took about 15mins to dry him. He wasn't to crazy about the sound but we got the job done. I love the different attachments. This dryer worked well with blowing his undercoat. I have already started recommending this dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Davis

customer_reviews.title: This dryer works great. Cuts grooming time in half
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had purchased sooner. This dryer works great. Cuts grooming time in half. It is loud though so I am having to gradually get my pups used to it.
customer_reviews.author: A. H. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: The blower/heater failed after less than a year. I’m ...
customer_reviews.text: The blower/heater failed after less than a year. I’m contacting the company about replacement and will update this review after I hear from them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is amazing!! I've been a groomer for years and wanted to get something for at home. I was nervous it wouldn't be powerful enough and boy was I wrong! I haven't even had to use it on high speed yet bc it has so much power! The heat settings are awesome and it's not loud like I thought it would be! I am very very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my 2 large german shepherds. Easy to use and dried them fast. It is loud but its bearable. I would use this outdoors or a large space. Blows out the undercoat really good.
customer_reviews.author: Maria D.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working a little after 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: Was really good at first. Love that you can adjust pressure of blower. Unfortunately, after a month, it was blowing heated air when the heat was turned off. Now after 5 months, it stopped blowing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Santos

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product to you guys
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is absolutely blowing up my mind. I only spent 5-10 mins to dry up my husky's hair . This dryer can definitely compare to those professional one that the dog spas are using. I can't believe that I only spend a hundred dollar and can have this kinda quality. This dryer is way beyond than a normal pet dryer. I highly recommend this product to you guys.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Small and effective
customer_reviews.text: This small dryer has worked great for me. It's not the most powerful dryer, but it's saved my ass at work. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: MLE3

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!!! Really works as described and ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product!!! Really works as described and more! Pets had to get use to it but it didn’t take long! I have a Siberian Husky, Saint Bernard, and a Sheltie😀
customer_reviews.author: Joy Berman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome , period.
customer_reviews.text: Gets really warm or luke warm quality switches , high end cord , high end hose and connection. They even threw a steel comb in the box. I almost bought a really high end model ie: expensive. I'm so glad I read the reviews here. I own three Black Russian Terriers and if anyone knows the breed they know how much hair there is to dry. My male went first he didn't care. Dried him in 7-10 minutes. He looks better than he ever has. Now I'm going to blow dry my truck. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Van Hoesen

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I buy this 2 years ago!,
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is very good. Dries in half the time my human hair dryer does. Not to hot or loud. I loved that it has two speeds and 2 settings for heat. All of the accessories are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: BReno

customer_reviews.title: This dryer is amazing and the price is great
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is amazing and the price is great! Like every dryer, it's a bit loud, but not too loud. It's small, very light weight and works great! It even came with an extra filter and a comb.
customer_reviews.author: SoPlaztic

customer_reviews.title: Small and light - but powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Been really happy with this for my giant schnauzer. It still takes quite a while to dry him, but this is a great option if you're not wanting to spend hundreds of dollars on a dog dryer. The heat option makes the hose kind of hot to hold sometimes, but the air coming out hasn't ever been too hot to use on my dog. Which I was worried about.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Standard Poodle
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I waited to get one of these! Pup dries in about 45 min, and looks so fluffy and clean. His hair stays that way for about a week afterwards too. So far it's working just great after 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppershar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Quick easy drying. Amazing how much hair you can blow off. Not super loud and light weight love it
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Works great. (Haven't used on my dogs yet waiting for ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast. Works great. (Haven't used on my dogs yet waiting for our grooming table and slowly introducing everyday till then) LOUD but efficient. Love the informative pamphlet included.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give this 5 stars is because the hose gets really hot so you have to be careful to not let it touch you or your Dog while using. The thick foam handle so you dont burn your hands is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Cassondra Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Loud but works great.
customer_reviews.text: So much faster than using my hair dryer. Also not as hot so doesn't burn their skin. Very loud though so scares the dog when you first turn it on. Too powerful even on low setting to do around their face so still need my dryer on low to do that. Fairly large to store. Even with these few negatives I really like how much time I saved in blow drying my 15 lb dog. Went from 20 minutes to 5!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cutroni

customer_reviews.title: Have only used four times but so far I happy with this dryer
customer_reviews.text: Have only used four times but so far I happy with this dryer. Quickly dries my fully grown rough collie in about 15 minuets. I always just use the low heat and low fan settings. He doesn’t mind the noise. Has a nice long hose and I really love the pronged attachment . It leaves his coat with a nice fluffy texture. Hope the dryer holds up. Fingers crossed
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Shopper

customer_reviews.title: but they're fine now. We've used the tools provided to lessen ...
customer_reviews.text: What a time saver. Drying time is cut in half. I have two cocker spaniels, both were afraid at first, but they're fine now. We've used the tools provided to lessen the power at first, now they just sit and relax. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer but plastic tooth accessory didn’t hold up after first use
customer_reviews.text: Love the dryer and it worked awesome but two teeth broke on the second dog after first use. I would like a replacement attachment but not sure how to contact vendor
customer_reviews.author: Fauxfilled

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife was a professional groomer for many years. Bought this dryer to use at home. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Hake

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recomment
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and very durable. Plenty of Air power and two speeds. Our dog was a little afraid at first, but now he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great in our grooming salon, cuts down drying time significantly! Quiet and easy to clean and change attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful home pet dryer
customer_reviews.text: This dryer has stood the test of time, since I have been using it on my pups since 2016. The dryer efficiently dries my standard poodles hair in less time so that the whole grooming process doesn't take too long.
customer_reviews.author: DES

customer_reviews.title: Great Dryer...
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional service from this seller. Worked with me to resolve initial issues. The dryer works very well. Quiet and strong. The adjustability factor helps ease pets new to grooming to the feel of the dryer. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna I Rodriguez-Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Money on a More Expensive Dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I owned expensive Kool Dry and Metro blow dryers for my Golden Retrievers, but this works every bit as well and costs a lot less.
customer_reviews.author: A Regular Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Wow, after using my hair dryer to dry my ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, after using my hair dryer to dry my dogs, this is a God send! Thank you, it's a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: An Epic K9 dryer
customer_reviews.text: Epic dryer! The best I've found! I would suggest for commercial or private use for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Rollie69

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dryer because of the higher HP believing it was more durable. Lasted only 5 months then bad electrical smell and suddenly stopped. Obviously shorted out internally
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Terrific item!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific dryer!!! Lots of power and features. Works like a charm!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Chudwick

customer_reviews.title: works awesome, almost need a slower low speed then a ...
customer_reviews.text: works awesome, almost need a slower low speed then a speed between existing low and high or a variable speed dial.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: This is like an airplane engine
customer_reviews.text: This is like an airplane engine....so loud that it was stressful for both me and my puppy each time we used it. It dries very quickly, but is so loud and powerful that it’s not worth the time it saved. I wish I hadn’t bought it. Well made otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Jinny

customer_reviews.title: COMPACT POWERHOUSE!!
customer_reviews.text: A small dryer with amazing output. Our standard poodle has a heavy coat and this dryer is very much more efficient and effective than the blow dryers we've used until now. This is also quality construction I expect will last for many, many years. We are very happy with this quality bargain.
customer_reviews.author: jim hemphill

customer_reviews.title: I am a satisfied customer! This hair dryer is just what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Works quickly and efficiently! I am a satisfied customer! This hair dryer is just what I was looking for for my bichon frise. Just after a few minutes his hair is completely dry and thanks to the power of the dryer, brushing his hair becomes easier. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, heavy duty. My dogs love it and it saves my back!
customer_reviews.author: copgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful for drying our cute little dog after a bath. Cuts the normal drying time more than in half.
customer_reviews.author: bravi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice products works very well with or without hose would definetly putchase again or recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Noise is loud but less than a normal hair dryer. Our dog is ok with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe O.

customer_reviews.title: much better than a regular hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: Much, much better than a regular hairdryer!! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Pet Owner
customer_reviews.text: This pet dryer is great. Now I don't have to use just a tiny hair dryer again. Our little dog gets dry in no time at all and the dryer came packaged very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right for Pretty Paws
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. My Corgi loves it. It's her spa treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Thriftyfind

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great! Dogs were afraid of it but are getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Mitts

customer_reviews.title: and does the job in 5-10 mins what used to take like 1 hr
customer_reviews.text: Superb blower with 2 speeds and heat controls... and does the job in 5-10 mins what used to take like 1 hr.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but too loud for dogs
customer_reviews.text: The dogs are so scared of this because of how loud it was. Very difficult to dry a few of my dogs. But too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: KC

product_meta.title: Free Paws Dog Dryer 4.0 HP 2 Speed Adjustable Heat Temperature Pet Dog Grooming Hair Dryer Blower Professional with 5 Different Nozzles and a Shower Massage Glove
feature_bullets: 🐼Nozzle Update🐼: New Patent 21 Holes Comb Nozzle and 7 Finger Nozzle. Use 5 different nozzles, you can use the different nozzles for different part of their body and make different shapes for your lovely pets. Ideal for home and salon use.

🐼Compared to handheld hair dryers our dryer reduces time by over 50%, saving your precious time, especially when grooming large dogs. You can dry a pet with very thick coat in a shorter time. Perfect for all seasons or car or bicycle.
🐼2 Airflow Speed 4921 FPM on Low or 9842 FPM on High; CFM: 92 or 99. Off, Low, High Heat Setting, Temperature is 96-158°F Adjustable When Heat Switch is on. Hair will dry faster with less damage.
🐼Adopting new generation of noise reduction device, this dog grooming dryer can effectively reduce noise, which won`t scare dogs. Rubberized feet keep the dryer stable when using.
🐼 Item comes with: 1x 4HP Dryer, 1x hose, 1x Shower Massage Glove, 2x Filters, 5x Nozzles. We Provide Replacement Parts as Carbon Brush, Hose, Nozzles, Filter, ect.

specifications.Item model number: Item is for US standard voltage AC110V
